text: avar bhumiyil sancaricc avarute mumpuntayirunnavarute antyam evvidhamayirunnuvenn neakki manas'silakkiyittille? avar ivarekkal angabalamullavarayirunnu. karuttukeantum bhumiyil sesippicca paitrkam keantum kututal prabalarayirunnu. ennittum avar sampadiccukeantirunnateannum avarkk upakariccilla
